answers.answer: Make sure you trust your dr that you are seeing. Get second and third opinions before you start to freak out. Trust me it helps to talk to other dr.'s..

question: i been having abdominal pains, fainting, sometime blackout.I just recently found out that i have high white blood cells and that it has been like that since october and has been getting higher since then. they asked for me to do more blood test and i recently been diagonised anemic and just gone back to normal. they also aked me to do a urine test for diabetes. i did some of my own research and panicin a bit, because all the websites i have been on are sayin Lukemeia, i dont know how you spell it. but im gettin a bit worried, now they sayin it could be ovarian cancer. please help me, im really worried and im under 18 years olds.This discussion is related to/posts/show/189758.
title: high white blood cell
